arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola Slammed For Full-Time Actions After Brighton 2-1 Man City
arts.sum: Football fans aren't impressed with Guardiola after the loss

arts.ttl: Late Brajan Gruda goal secures Brighton comeback win over fading Man City
arts.sum: after Matheus Nunes inexplicably handled Lewis Dunk's volley in the box.

arts.ttl: 'It's just one game' - Guardiola unfazed by Brighton defeat
arts.sum: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says he has "no complaints" with their performance despite losing 2-1 to Brighton in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: James Milner dedicates goal against Man City to former Liverpool team-mate Diogo Jota as he performs his trademark celebration
arts.sum: James Milner paid tribute to former Liverpool team-mate Diogo Jota after scoring his first Premier League goal in six years on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Three Takeaways As Man City Surrender Lead in Disappointing Defeat at Brighton
arts.sum: Brighton’s late winner at the Amex Stadium means Man City have won just once from their opening three Premier League games.

arts.ttl: Manchester City 1 Brighton 2: City player ratings from the Amex Stadium.
arts.sum: Brajan Gruda would win the game for Brighton in the 89th minute as Manchester City’s legs wilted and the hosts thoroughly deserved their victory. The hosts had more energy than Pep Guardiola’s side, and from the moment James Milner equalised from the penalty spot in the 67th minute, there was only one winner.

arts.ttl: Brighton 2-1 Manchester City: Pep Guardiola beaten again as Brajan Gruda hits late winner
arts.sum: Erling Haaland opened the scoring but the Seagulls came from behind with two second-half goals

arts.ttl: Man City vulnerabilities resurface in second shock defeat in a row
arts.sum: Brajan Gruda added to James Milner’s penalty equaliser after City’s Erling Haaland opened the scoring

arts.ttl: Man City stunned by Brighton's late show as Pep Guardiola endures nightmare start
arts.sum: BRIGHTON 2-1 MANCHESTER CITY: Pep Guardiola's side have been beaten for the second time in the opening three Premier League games as Brighton's late winner saw them overcome a half-time deficit

arts.ttl: Man City Fans Slam 'Awful' Ace Who Got 'Eaten Alive' During 2-1 Loss to Brighton
arts.sum: Man City fans tear into 'awful' ace who got 'eaten alive' during 2-1 loss to Brighton
